quarks.connectors.pubsub.service

Interface PublishSubscribeService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProviderPubSub

    public interface PublishSubscribeService
    Publish subscribe service.
    Service that allows jobs to subscribe to streams published by other jobs.
    This is an optional service that allows streams to be published by topic between jobs.

    When an instance of this service is not available then publish is a no-op, a sink that discards all tuples on the stream.
    A subscribe will have no tuples when an instance of this service is not available.

    See Also:
    PublishSubscribe.publish(quarks.topology.TStream, String, Class), PublishSubscribe.subscribe(quarks.topology.TopologyElement, String, Class)

      • getPublishDestination

        <T> Consumer<T> getPublishDestination(java.lang.String topic,
                                      java.lang.Class<? super T> streamType)
        Get the destination for a publisher. A publisher calls destination.accept(tuple) to publish tuple to the topic.
        Parameters:
        topic - Topic tuples will be published to.
        streamType - Type of the stream
        Returns:
        Consumer that is used to publish tuples.
